name: Fruits Warehouse!
title: MERN Stack
descrip: Warehouse's application, where user can buy and seller can stock more product.
description1: User can see all product on Home route.
description2: Admin can update and delete product
description3: Admin can add product by clicking on addfruits route
description4: On My Items route user can see what he/she added on the website
description5: On Blogs section everyone can see blogs.

name: Express Car Parts!
title: MERN Stack
descrip: A car parts selling application where user can easily buy car parts with few clicks
description1: User can buy a product if he/she login
description2: User can see their profile and order on dashboard page.
description3: Admin and user has different dashboard Where admin can manage all user, all order, make admin, and also can add product to the website.
description4: User have a route where they can add review about product or website.
description5: Used JSON Web Token (JWT) to the server side to ensure more security from stealing data.

name: Gym-Trainer!
title: Landing Page
descrip: gym trainer is the one-stop solution if you want to make fit yourself. where a trainer provide a gym service
description1: User can login to the website by email-password or google sign in
description2: User can reset password if he/see forgot the password
description3: User can book a service by clicking on add button
description4: On blog route user can see the blogs
description5: On about route user can see about the trainer
